thread.title: Can We Please Discuss Celine Dion's Incredible Outfit?
thread.title_full: Can We Please Discuss Celine Dion's Incredible Outfit?

title: Can We Please Discuss Celine Dion's Incredible Outfit?
text:
Can We Please Discuss Celine Dion's Incredible Outfit? 
COUTURE, no less. By Kristina Rodulfo Feb 22, 2017 Over the past year, Celine Dion has emerged as one of our favorite street style stars to watch. She delivered again yesterday at the Las Vegas launch of her first handbag and accessory collection. That's right–Celine Dion is now a designer! But first, let's discuss this outfit. Because, HELLO. Getty Exhibit A: It's all-white. A true sign of confidence. Exhibit B: It's not a skirt (like it looks here), but SHORTS! A post shared by WWD (@wwd) on Feb 21, 2017 at 6:32pm PST Most Popular Exhibit C: The giant heart and arrow on the jacket is a week late for Valentine's Day, but it WORKS. Exhibit D: RED. SUEDE. THIGH HIGH. BOOTS. Exhibit E: It's Elsa Schiaparelli couture. Enough said. A post shared by Law Roach (@luxurylaw) on Feb 21, 2017 at 3:16pm PST As with all Celine's amazing looks, the outfit was dreamt up by Law Roach , the stylist who–true story–she started working with after loving Zendaya's look. She gave him a shout-out at the event and sang his name (of course). A post shared by WWD (@wwd) on Feb 21, 2017 at 7:26pm PST More from ELLE:
